item.title: Magnificent Japanese underwater city
item.description: The futuristic designs for "Ocean Spiral," a sea metropolis for 5,000.
item.ExtractedText: << Previous Â Next >> What would happen if the legend of the lost City of Atlantis was crossed with the screenplay for Kevin Costner's 1995 hit movie "Waterworld?" Maybe something like The Ocean Spiral -- an underwater metropolis which generates its own energy from the seabed, produces food from deep sea aquaculture and is capable of providing accommodation for 5,000 people.
